articles.title: 4 tigers rescued from Argentina get new home in South Africa
articles.description: Four Bengal tigers rescued from years of captivity in a train carriage in Argentina have been released into open-air enclosures in South Africa.

articles.title: Apple Pay arrives in Argentina and Peru
articles.description: Apple Pay has arrived in Argentina and Peru.
articles.content:
Apple Pay has arrived in both Argentina and Peru.
First reported by pisapapeles, both countries now officially support one of the best iPhone and Apple Watch features available. Customers in both Argentina and Peru can now pay for items out and about... [882 chars]

articles.title: Apple Pay now available in Argentina and Peru, 'coming soon' to Chile
articles.description: In January, Apple announced Apple Pay was expanding soon to more South American countries. Now, it's finally available in Argentina and Peru.
articles.content:
At the beginning of the year, Apple teased Apple Pay availability in Argentina, Peru, and Chile as “coming soon.” Now, Apple’s payment system is finally available in Argentina and Peru.

articles.title: Argentina suspends soyabean exports as prices climb
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina—Argentina’s government announced on Monday it had suspended exports of soyabean flour and oil amid rumors it is planning to hike taxes due to soaring primary material costs blamed on Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content:

articles.description: Despite their best efforts the death toll remains huge: 157 in Brazil between 2009 and 2019, 136 in Argentina in the last 20 years and at least 170 in Colombia between 2001 and 2019.
